text:
[Verse]
City lights they glow so bright
Neon signs they light the night
Footsteps echo on the street
Dreams are chasing don't retreat

[Verse 2]
Busy streets and crowded bars
Look above and count the stars
Taxi horns and loud guitars
Find yourself no matter how far

[Chorus]
City nights we'll dance away
Never fade just seize the day
Through the alley to the bay
City nights we'll find our way

[Verse 3]
Street performers on the stage
Turn the page escape the cage
Voices rising in a rage
Every moment like a sage

[Chorus]
City nights we'll dance away
Never fade just seize the day
Through the alley to the bay
City nights we'll find our way

[Bridge]
Silent whispers in the air
Find the spark that's hidden there
Feel the magic everywhere
City nights no need to care
title: City Nights
